description:
go.talks/pkg/present: substitute tabs with 4 spaces in preformatted blocks

Browsers tend to render tabs badly.
This is the same approach we took in godoc.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to

go.talks/pkg/present: substitute tabs with 4 spaces in preformatted blocks

Browsers tend to render tabs badly.
This is the same approach we took in godoc.
